articles.title: First study in North America uses genetic testing to identify people at risk of heart disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Dignity Health in Arizona is launching the first research study in North America in which genetic testing is used to identify men and women at risk of developing heart disease based on the makeup of their DNA.
